bug.author: fritzo
bug.description:
Now I can't build docs. It would be nice if we could avoid treating warnings as errors locally. <denchmark-code>$ make docs /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/bin/make -C docs html Running Sphinx v1.6.3 loading intersphinx inventory from https://docs.python.org/objects.inv... intersphinx inventory has moved: https://docs.python.org/objects.inv -> https://docs.python.org/2/objects.inv building [mo]: targets for 0 po files that are out of date building [html]: targets for 9 source files that are out of date updating environment: 9 added, 0 changed, 0 removed reading sources... [100%] primitives
Warning, treated as error: /Users/fritzobermeyer/github/uber/pyro/pyro/distributions/transformed_distribution.py:docstring of pyro.distributions.transformed_distribution.TransformedDistribution:1:Inline interpreted text or phrase reference start-string without end-string. make[1]: *** [html] Error 1 make: *** [docs] Error 2 </denchmark-code>
